contentrichtext.text: [[File:RI - DOC.png|right|240px]] The '''Rhode Island Department of Corrections''' ('''RIDOC''') is a state agency of [[Rhode Island]] operating state prisons. It has its headquarters in [[Cranston, Rhode Island|Cranston]].<ref>"[http://www.doc.ri.gov/contact/index.php Contact Us]." Rhode Island Department of Corrections. Retrieved on December 7, 2009.</ref> The Rhode Island Adult Correctional Institute (ACI) consists of eight Prison Buildings located on the grounds of The Rhode Island Department of Corrections, six for males and two for females. The Rhode Island Adult Correctional Institute is located in Cranston.
